paragraphs.text: Do your research. If you are struggling with something, I guarantee you someone has gone through something similar and written about it. Use the power of the internet to find these resources and connect with the creators.
paragraphs.name: 4dff

paragraphs.text: Anxiety is an emotion, not an identity. Realize that the emotion will always be there, but that you don’t have to be its slave.
paragraphs.name: 192b

paragraphs.text: Why is it that some people heal their anxiety and some don’t?
paragraphs.name: 8a58

paragraphs.text: “Tomorrow and plans for tomorrow can have no significance at all unless you are in full contact with the reality of the present, since it is in the present and only in the present that you live.” — Alan Watts
paragraphs.name: 2a6f

paragraphs.text: After months of working at a job I hated, I quit and moved to an entirely new city. The thought of doing this scared the shit out of me, so I knew it had to be done.
paragraphs.name: 473c

paragraphs.text: After months of working at a job I hated, I quit and moved to an entirely new city. The thought of doing this scared the shit out of me, so I knew it had to be done.
paragraphs.name: 473c

866958363730.title: I’m so grateful to hear that. Please keep writing we need more people sharing their own truth!

paragraphs.text: I’m so grateful to hear that. Please keep writing we need more people sharing their own truth!
paragraphs.name: 1fbb

paragraphs.text: That’s typically it, right? “It had to be done.” And often times some people are just not willing, even if it may be for the greater good in the long run, to do what is necessary to move forward. Often the sacrifice is just too much for some people. I have some family members who are fearless when it comes to the daily stuff — letting stressful…
Thanks, Prianka!
paragraphs.name: b833

paragraphs.text: Haha, Yes, I’m a human.

ac3ab7f584a1.title: Thanks Benjamin, I agree with you, too.

paragraphs.text: Thanks Benjamin, I agree with you, too. The illness under a label can be an excuse to do nothing. I decided not to succumb to the label, rather to accept it, carry it along. At some point you get used to it and start to heal. Your experience works fine, too. I understand it completelly.
paragraphs.name: 7b18

paragraphs.text: Keep up the good work. God bless.

Thanks for sharing Tomo. I agree that you shouldn’t lie to yourself. What I was trying to articulate is the notion that people hold themselves back in the healing process by hiding behind a label.

paragraphs.text: “Oh, I can’t do that I have anxiety.” Or any variation.

paragraphs.text: I’ve struggled with anxiety for several years since my dad passed away suddenly. I just moved to NYC, too, from the Midwest. My therapist told me, “Can I be honest with you? I don’t know anyone with that much anxiety who would pick up and move across the country like this."
paragraphs.name: eec1

paragraphs.text: Love this — Anxiety is a real thing and I agree it can be managed and controlled. I’m working on a post about the unexpected correlation between anxiety and success I discovered. It wasn’t what I thought.
paragraphs.name: 336e

887b00b9aedc.title: Often that comes from a fear from the unknown.

paragraphs.text: Often that comes from a fear from the unknown. They have a deep understanding of the daily stresses by none of the unknown. But we were not meant to live comfortably. We are tasked to make an impact. And with that calling comes a lot of fear. So learning to see it as a friend is extremely helpful.
paragraphs.name: 24d8

paragraphs.text: Kayli. So amazing. Please keep believing in yourself. Take the time to get your diet and lifestyle right, and even on the bad days, know it will be worth it. You have at least one fan cheering you on.

e51ce8049a80.title: I went through the opposite path.

paragraphs.text: I went through the opposite path. I fully accepted my identity as an anxious person. Like someone has to accept diabetes. Once it became part of me and determined my do’s and don’ts, I felt relieved. Eventually I built my confidence in accepting my self fully, anxiety included. It is importat to emphasize: I am not my illness. I have an illness. And…

b7185e4e60cc.title: I never said that this advice would work for everyone and specifically stated that people should…

paragraphs.text: I never said that this advice would work for everyone and specifically stated that people should not stop or never take medication. But that is advice that everyone has heard and knows too well. The purpose of this article was to share some advice that helped me in the hopes that it may helps someone else. Thanks for the feedback
paragraphs.name: 3bde

fe0853df7352.title: You should be careful with this kind of advice.

paragraphs.text: You should be careful with this kind of advice. I liked reading your story and it’s nice to know that you also healed without resorting to medication.
paragraphs.name: 19b4

paragraphs.text: However there are many different people out there and many need medication and (or) therapy. It is dangerous to say that everyone can heal the same way that you did.
